title: Research examines best methods for growing Atlantic sea scallops
body: A new study from the University of Maine's Aquaculture Research Institute (ARI) and Darling Marine Center is helping to refine best practices for growing Atlantic sea scallops (Placopecten ... with two commercial scallop farms in Maine's Penobscot Bay ...

title: Best methods for growing Atlantic sea scallops
body: A new study compares two scallop farming methods, ear-hanging and lantern net culture, over a complete grow-out cycle to determine which approach yields the best results for commercial growers. The study found that scallops grown with ear-hanging culture had slightly larger shell heights,
